## EmissionsERC20 class

A class for calling methods on a EmissionsERC20.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EmissionsERC20 extends TierFactoryContract 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [TierFactoryContract](./rain-sdk.tierfactorycontract.md)

## Remarks

This class provides an easy way to deploy and interact with EmissionsERC20's.

## Example


```typescript
import { EmissionsERC20 } from 'rain-sdk';

// To deploy a new EmissionsERC20, pass an ethers.js Signer and the config for the EmissionsERC20.
const newEmission = EmissionsERC20.deploy(signer, args);

// Check if an address is child from the factory deployed in the current chain.
await EmissionsERC20.isChild(signer, newEmission.address);
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(address, signer)](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new EmissionsERC20 from a known address. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowance](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.allowance.md) |  | (owner: string, spender: string, overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt; | Returns the remaining number of tokens that <code>spender</code> will be allowed to spend on behalf of <code>owner</code> through <code>transferFrom()</code>. This is zero by default.<!-- -->This value changes when <code>approve()</code> or <code>transferFrom()</code> are called. |
|  [allowDelegatedClaims](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.allowdelegatedclaims.md) |  | (overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;boolean&gt; | Whether the claimant must be the caller of <code>claim</code>. If <code>false</code> then accounts other than claimant can claim. This may or may not be desirable depending on the emissions schedule. For example, a linear schedule will produce the same end result for the claimant regardless of who calls <code>claim</code> or when but an exponential schedule is more profitable if the claimant waits longer between claims. In the non-linear case delegated claims would be inappropriate as third party accounts could grief claimants by claiming "early", thus forcing opportunity cost on claimants who would have preferred to wait. |
|  [approve](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.approve.md) |  | (spender: string, amount: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Sets <code>amount</code> as the allowance of <code>spender</code> over the caller's tokens.<!-- -->Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. |
|  [balanceOf](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.balanceof.md) |  | (account: string, overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt; | Returns the amount of tokens owned by <code>account</code>. |
|  [calculateClaim](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.calculateclaim.md) |  | (claimant: string, overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt; | Calculates the claim without processing it. Read only method that may be useful downstream both onchain and offchain if a claimant wants to check the claim amount before deciding whether to process it. As this is read only there are no checks against delegated claims. It is possible to return a value from <code>calculateClaim</code> and to not be able to process the claim with <code>claim</code> if <code>msg.sender</code> is not the <code>claimant</code>. |
|  [claim](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.claim.md) |  | (claimant: string, data: BytesLike, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Processes the claim for <code>claimant_</code>. - Enforces <code>allowDelegatedClaims</code> if it is <code>true</code> so that <code>msg.sender</code> must also be <code>claimant_</code>. - Takes the return from <code>calculateClaim</code> and mints for <code>claimant_</code>. - Records the current block as the claim-tier for this contract. - emits a <code>Claim</code> event as per <code>IClaim</code>. |
|  [decimals](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.decimals.md) |  | (overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;number&gt; | Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. |
|  [decreaseAllowance](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.decreaseallowance.md) |  | (spender: string, subtractedValue: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Atomically decreases the allowance granted to <code>spender</code> by the caller.<!-- -->This is an alternative to <code>approve()</code> that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20\#issuecomment-263524729. |
|  [deploy](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.deploy.md) | <code>static</code> | (signer: Signer, args: [EmissionsERC20DeployArgs](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20deployargs.md)<!-- -->, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;[EmissionsERC20](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Deploys a new EmissionsERC20. |
|  [increaseAllowance](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.increaseallowance.md) |  | (spender: string, addedValue: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Atomically increases the allowance granted to <code>spender</code> by the caller.<!-- -->This is an alternative to <code>approve()</code> that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20\#issuecomment-263524729. |
|  [isChild](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.ischild.md) | <code>static</code> | (signer: Signer, maybeChild: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;boolean&gt; | Checks if address is registered as a child contract of this RedeemableERC20Factory on a specific network |
|  [name](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.name.md) |  | (overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;string&gt; | Returns the name of the token. |
|  [nameBookReference](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.namebookreference.md) | <code>static</code> | (not declared) |  |
|  [setTier](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.settier.md) |  | (account: string, endTier: BigNumberish, data: BytesLike, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md) \| undefined) =&gt; Promise&lt;never&gt; | It is NOT implemented in Emissions. Always will throw an error |
|  [symbol](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.symbol.md) |  | (overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;string&gt; | Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name. |
|  [totalSupply](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.totalsupply.md) |  | (overrides?: [ReadTxOverrides](./rain-sdk.readtxoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt; | Returns the amount of tokens in existence. |
|  [transfer](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.transfer.md) |  | (to: string, amount: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Moves <code>amount</code> tokens from the caller's account to <code>to</code>.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- <code>to</code> cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least <code>amount</code>. |
|  [transferFrom](./rain-sdk.emissionserc20.transferfrom.md) |  | (from: string, to: string, amount: BigNumberish, overrides?: [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;ContractTransaction&gt; | Moves <code>amount</code> tokens from <code>from</code> to <code>to</code> using the allowance mechanism. <code>amount</code> is then deducted from the caller's allowance.<!-- -->NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum <code>uint256</code>.<!-- -->Requirements:<!-- -->- <code>from</code> and <code>to</code> cannot be the zero address. - <code>from</code> must have a balance of at least <code>amount</code>. - the caller must have allowance for <code>from</code>'s tokens of at least <code>amount</code>. |
